author: _shemnon
content: Seeking an opinion from the editors.  The GraphQL EIP (https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-1767) has not been updated for the london/EIP-1559 changes.  Would the correct course be to open a new EIP amending 1767 or to update EIP-1767.  For reference the status went from draft to stagnant in Sept of 2021.

author: _shemnon
content: Meta questions are what would it take to get an RPC ERC from draft to accepted, and how to handle interface evolution in RPC EIPs (London won't be the last fork updating what data should be in RPCs).

author: samwilsn
content:
Updating the current one or creating a new one are both valid options. Really depends on how active the authors of the original are.

If they're around to approve PRs (perhaps adding new authors), I'd recommend updating the original. If they aren't, then you'll have to make a new EIP.
